title: Concepts Have Consequences
author: VD
content_html:
The family structure is the source of psychological, economic, and political oppression.

  • Shulameth Firestone

Shulamith Bath Shmuel Ben Ari Feuerstein, a radical feminist Jew, died alone in her home at the age of 67. Her body lay undiscovered for days.

By their fruits ye shall know them.

If there is one thing that we have learned from the observable history of the Synagogue of Satan, it is that Satan doesn’t give a sliver of a quantum of a damn about his servants. He doesn’t even hesitate to throw them from his high horse. The fancypants and the lollipops he offers really are not worth it.

DISCUSS ON SG
